originalText.text: Dr. Rosenthal is a rock star in the world of healing and NMM.  Within minutes of meeting her, I knew I was in the right place for customized whole body healing and health.  She looks at health as a long term commitment and works on a plan with you that requires you to be an active participant in sustaining your own health - without meds!  To me, this is real, honest “medicine."

text.text: Dr. Rosenthal is a rock star in the world of healing and NMM.  Within minutes of meeting her, I knew I was in the right place for customized whole body healing and health.  She looks at health as a long term commitment and works on a plan with you that requires you to be an active participant in sustaining your own health - without meds!  To me, this is real, honest “medicine."

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Rosenthal with general pain and specific knee and back issues. I was immediately was put at ease. She was interested in my lifestyle, my habits - a real holistic approach that enabled her to make recommendations (not medications!) that have tremendously helped me. Stretches, dietary suggestions, walking, etc. From the minute I arrived I knew she really cares about her patients and listens closely. I did not want to depend on medications and Dr. Rosenthal was able to help me avoid that.

originalText.text: Dr. Rosenthal was an amazing doctor and helped me so much. She was patient and caring and spent a lot of time with me to figure out what my main issue was it and how she can help me.She help me with my orthopedic problem nonsurgically and was able to show me how to further take care of myself so it wouldn’t happen again. I would recommend her to anybody that asked.

originalText.text: Dr. Lillie Rosenthal has been a brilliant and humane, caring and holistic doctor to me for over ten years. She has treated me for different kinds of injuries (frozen shoulder, top-of-the-foot injury, back strain) with unique insight as to cause and cure. If there is any doubt as to her capabilities, she often moonlights as the on-call Dr. for top NYC dance and music performance venues. There really is no one better!

originalText.text: Dr. Rosenthal is amazing. She is compassionate and skilled and makes you feel like you are her top priority. She got me back to running when other docs told me to quit! Highly recommended.
